job.title: Data Management - Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr
job.description: strongBig DataMachine Learning Engineer SrbrbrstrongstrongDuration 8 months brbrstrongstrongPlano TX Remote till labor daybrbrstrongPotential Contract to Hire eligible candidatesbrbrstronguAbout The Department And TeambrbrustrongData Governance and risk management From the organizational point of view we get highquality trusted data The vision is to make sure that the data used within data finance should meet the quality standards we work with different accountable professionals to make sure that we deliver the data as per the predefined standards In case the data is not up to the mark we do root cause analysis and provide those risk analyses to the teambrbrThe volume of the work is hugebrbrNot taking the manual approachbrbrThe primary role is not to shift these data from one place to another it would be nice to havebrbrstronguTechnology Required Must HavebrbrustrongstrongTargeting for 35 years of experienced candidatesbrbrstrongNot completely a data engineerbrbrPython Proficient Programming and scripting so that they know what to do in case there is any loophole or correction is neededbrbrSQL Must have very strongbrbrBI Grafana or TableaubrbrstrongNice to havestrong AWS for them to get converted to full timebrbrData governance and Data management knowledgebrbrstronguSoft SkillsbrbrustrongInteract with senior folks directors and audiencebrbrGood Presenting skills to explain the data Very ImportantbrbrSomeone comfortable to deal with the high Volume work Very ImportantbrbrPerform root cause analysis and risk report for COAF datasetsbrbrPython SQL Tableau
